text: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَلَا تُسۡمِعُ ٱلصُّمَّ ٱلدُّعَآءَ إِذَا وَلَّوۡاْ مُدۡبِرِينَ
translation: You cannot make the dead[26] hear, nor can you make the deaf hear the call when they turn their backs retreating.
footnotes: [26] i.e., whose hearts have died due to their disbelief in Allah.
